title: Crimes Against Magic
description: How do you keep the people you care about safe from enemies you can’t remember?Ten years ago, Nate Garrett awoke on a cold warehouse floor with no memory of his past and the only clues to his identity a piece of paper with his name on it and a propensity toward magic. Now he’s a powerful sorcerer and a successful thief for hire, but it turns out that those who stole his memories aren’t done with him yet. When they cause a job to go bad, threatening a sixteen-year-old girl, Nate swears to protect her. But with his enemies closing in and the barrier holding back his memories beginning to crumble, Nate is forced to confront his forgotten life in the hope of stopping an enemy he can’t remember.Crimes Against Magic is a dark, fast-paced urban fantasy torn between modern-day London and fifteenth-century France.
author: Steve McHugh
